channel.title: Can't find where to change IP in blindscape delta server source
channel.description: I just got the blindscape delta server source and can't find where to change the ip in the client.java I tried searching for (using CTRL + F) 0.0.0.0,127.0.0.0,serverip and still cant find where to change it. thank you for the help!

item.title: Can't find where to change IP in blindscape delta server source
item.dc:creator: @Wildy_kingz Wildy kingz
item.description:
@Wildy_kingz wrote:

I don’t know, i know how to fix it once i find that but i don’t know how to find the ip.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't find where to change IP in blindscape delta server source
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

The port isn’t set in the Client class, unless you are thinking of the blindscape client, in the server all you do is set the port number the default is 43594 in most servers. If you’re talking about the client then you can change the ip and port in either the Client class or GUI class or the EGUI class depending on the client you use.

Read full topic
